com.reactivecascade.reactive

Class ReactiveInteger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.reactivecascade.util.Origin
      • com.reactivecascade.reactive.Subscription<T,T>
        • com.reactivecascade.reactive.ReactiveValue<Integer>
          • com.reactivecascade.reactive.ReactiveInteger
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAsyncOrigin, IGettable<Integer>, INamed, IReactiveSource<Integer>, IReactiveTarget<Integer>, IReactiveValue<Integer>, ISafeGettable<Integer>, ISettable<Integer>

    public class ReactiveInteger
extends ReactiveValue<Integer>
    An Integer which can be updated in an atomic, thread-safe manner.

    This is similar to an AtomicInteger with reactive bindings to get and set the from in reactive chains (function sequences that can fire multiple times).

    Created by phou on 30-04-2015.

    • Field Summary
